Name: project_must_have_team
Description: A project must have at least one team assigned

Name: worker_availability_threshold
Description: An individual worker's availability must be at least 80%

Name: feature_priority_range
Description: Feature priority must be between 1 (low) and 5 (critical)

Name: blocker_severity_limit
Description: No blocker can have a severity greater than 4 (critical)

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_set
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: task_effort_positive
Description: The effort for any task must be a positive number

Name: team_size_limit
Description: A team cannot have more than 9 members

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: Every user story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration of a sprint must be exactly 2 weeks (14 days)

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget
